sx.blah.discord.util

Class MessageList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<IMessage>
        • sx.blah.discord.util.MessageList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<IMessage>, Collection<IMessage>, List<IMessage>

    public class MessageList
extends AbstractList<IMessage>
implements List<IMessage>
    This class is a custom implementation of List for retrieving discord messages. The list gets a message on demand, it either fetches it from the cache or it requests the message from Discord if not cached.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MessageList.MessageListEventListener
      This is used to automatically update the message list.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_GUILD_COUNT
      This is the max number of guild before the list stops automatically loading its history.
      static int MESSAGE_CHUNK_COUNT
      This represents the amount of messages to fetch from discord every time the index goes out of bounds.
      static int UNLIMITED_CAPACITY
      Represents a maximum message capacity which will be unlimited (-1).

      • MESSAGE_CHUNK_COUNT

        public static final int MESSAGE_CHUNK_COUNT
        This represents the amount of messages to fetch from discord every time the index goes out of bounds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNLIMITED_CAPACITY

        public static final int UNLIMITED_CAPACITY
        Represents a maximum message capacity which will be unlimited (-1). Yay, no magic numbers!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_GUILD_COUNT

        public static final int MAX_GUILD_COUNT
        This is the max number of guild before the list stops automatically loading its history.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

                   IChannel channel,
                   int initialContents)
        Parameters:
        client - The client for this list to respect.
        channel - The channel to retrieve messages from.
        initialContents - The initial amount of messages to have cached when this list is constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public IMessage get(int index)
        This implementation of List.get(int) first checks if the requested message is cached, if so it retrieves that object, otherwise it requests messages from discord in chunks of MESSAGE_CHUNK_COUNT until it gets the requested object. If the object cannot be found, it throws an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
        Specified by:
        get in interface List<IMessage>
        Specified by:
        get in class AbstractList<IMessage>
        Parameters:
        index - The index (starting at 0) of the message in this list.
        Returns:
        The message object for this index.

      • purge

        public int purge()
        This purges the list's internal message cache so that the oldest messages are removed until the list's capacity requirements are met.
        Returns:
        The amount of messages cleared.

      • add

        public boolean add(IMessage message)
        This adds a message object to the internal message cache.
        Specified by:
        add in interface Collection<IMessage>
        Specified by:
        add in interface List<IMessage>
        Overrides:
        add in class AbstractList<IMessage>
        Parameters:
        message - The message object to cache.
        Returns:
        True if the object was successfully cached, false if otherwise.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(String id)
        This checks if a message with the provided id is cached my this list.
        Parameters:
        id - The id.
        Returns:
        True if found, false if otherwise.

      • size

        public int size()
        This implementation of List.size() gets the size of the internal message cache NOT the total amount of messages which exist in a channel in total.
        Specified by:

      • copy

        public List<IMessage> copy()
        This creates a new List from this message list.
        Returns:
        The copied list. Note: This list is a copy of the current message cache, not a copy of this specific instance of MessageList. It will ONLY ever contain the contents of the current message cache.

      • reverse

        public List<IMessage> reverse()
        A utility method to reverse the order of this list.
        Returns:
        A reversed COPY of this list.
        See Also:
        copy()

      • getEarliestMessage

        public IMessage getEarliestMessage()
        This retrieves the earliest CACHED message.
        Returns:
        The earliest message. A cleaner version of get(int) with an index of size()-1.

      • getLatestMessage

        public IMessage getLatestMessage()
        This retrieves the latest CACHED message.
        Returns:
        The latest message. A cleaner version of get(int) with an index of 0.

      • get

        public IMessage get(String id)
        This retrieves a message object with the specified message id.
        Parameters:
        id - The message id to search for.
        Returns:
        The message object found, or null if nonexistent.

      • load

        public boolean load(int messageCount)
             throws RateLimitException
        This attempts to load the specified number of messages into the list's cache. NOTE: this calls purge() after loading.
        Parameters:
        messageCount - The amount of messages to load.
        Returns:
        True if this action was successful, false if otherwise.
        Throws:
        RateLimitException

      • setCacheCapacity

        public void setCacheCapacity(int capacity)
        Sets the maximum amount of messages to be cached by this list. NOTE: This purges immediately after changing the capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - The capacity, if negative the capacity will be unlimited.

      • getCacheCapacity

        public int getCacheCapacity()
        Gets the maximum amount of messages to be cached by this list.
        Returns:
        The capacity, if negative the capacity will be unlimited.

      • delete

        public IMessage delete(int index)
                throws RateLimitException,
                       DiscordException,
                       MissingPermissionsException
        This deletes the message at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to delete the message at.
        Returns:
        The message deleted and removed form the cache.
        Throws:
        RateLimitException
        DiscordException
        MissingPermissionsException

      • deleteFromRange

        public List<IMessage> deleteFromRange(int startIndex,
                                      int endIndex)
                               throws RateLimitException,
                                      DiscordException,
                                      MissingPermissionsException
        Bulk deletes messages in a sub list created from the start and end indexes. (Note: Only 100 messages can be deleted at a time).
        Parameters:
        startIndex - The start index (inclusive).
        endIndex - The end index (exclusive).
        Returns:
        The messages deleted.
        Throws:
        RateLimitException
        DiscordException
        MissingPermissionsException

      • deleteAfter

                                  int amount)
                           throws RateLimitException,
                                  DiscordException,
                                  MissingPermissionsException
        Bulk deletes messages in a sub list created from the provided index to the amount of messages requested. (Note: Only 100 messages can be deleted at a time).
        Parameters:
        index - The start index (inclusive).
        amount - The amount of messages to attempt to delete.
        Returns:
        The messages deleted.
        Throws:
        RateLimitException
        DiscordException
        MissingPermissionsException

      • bulkDelete

        public void bulkDelete(List<IMessage> messages)
                throws DiscordException,
                       RateLimitException,
                       MissingPermissionsException
        This "bulk deletes" a list of messages. (Note: Only 100 messages can be deleted at a time).
        Parameters:
        messages - The messages to delete.
        Throws:
        DiscordException
        RateLimitException
        MissingPermissionsException

      • shouldDownloadHistoryAutomatically

        public static void shouldDownloadHistoryAutomatically(boolean download)
        This sets whether MessageLists should automatically fetch message history on initialization. This is automatically disabled if the number of guilds logged into exceeds MAX_GUILD_COUNT.
        Parameters:
        download - Whether to automatically download history.

      • downloadsHistoryAutomatically

        public static boolean downloadsHistoryAutomatically()
        This gets whether MessageLists will automatically fetch message history on initialization. This is automatically disabled if the number of guilds logged into exceeds MAX_GUILD_COUNT.
        Returns:
        Whether it'll automatically download history.
